verses.verse: Now there was a man <S%H376><s%> of the hill <S%H2022><s%> country <S%H2022><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Micah. <S%H4321><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> to his mother, <S%H517><s%> "The eleven <S%H505><s%> <S%H3967><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> [pieces] of silver <S%H3701><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were taken <S%H3947><s%> from you, about which you uttered <S%H422><s%> a curse <S%H422><s%> in my hearing, <S%H241><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> the silver <S%H3701><s%> is with me; I took <S%H3947><s%> it." And his mother <S%H517><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be my son <S%H1121><s%> by the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>"

He then returned <S%H7725><s%> the eleven <S%H505><s%> <S%H3967><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> [pieces] of silver <S%H3701><s%> to his mother, <S%H517><s%> and his mother <S%H517><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "I wholly <S%H6942><s%> dedicate <S%H6942><s%> the silver <S%H3701><s%> from my hand <S%H3027><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> for my son <S%H1121><s%> to make <S%H6213><s%> a graven <S%H6459><s%> image <S%H6459><s%> and a molten <S%H4541><s%> image; <S%H4541><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, I will return <S%H7725><s%> them to you."

So when he returned <S%H7725><s%> the silver <S%H3701><s%> to his mother, <S%H517><s%> his mother <S%H517><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> [pieces] of silver <S%H3701><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> them to the silversmith <S%H6884><s%> who made <S%H6213><s%> them into a graven <S%H6459><s%> image <S%H6459><s%> and a molten <S%H4541><s%> image, <S%H4541><s%> and they were in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Micah. <S%H4321><s%>

And the man <S%H376><s%> Micah <S%H4318><s%> had a shrine <S%H1004><s%> <S%H430><s%> and he made <S%H6213><s%> an ephod <S%H646><s%> and household <S%H8655><s%> idols <S%H8655><s%> and consecrated <S%H4390><s%> <S%H3027><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of his sons, <S%H1121><s%> that he might become <S%H1961><s%> his priest. <S%H3548><s%>

In those <S%H1992><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> there <S%H369><s%> was no <S%H369><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> in Israel; <S%H3478><s%> every <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> what <S%H3477><s%> was right <S%H3477><s%> in his own eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

Now there was a young <S%H5288><s%> man <S%H5288><s%> from Bethlehem <S%H1035><s%> in Judah, <S%H3063><s%> of the family <S%H4940><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> who <S%H1931><s%> was a Levite; <S%H3881><s%> and he was staying <S%H1481><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

Then the man <S%H376><s%> departed <S%H1980><s%> from the city, <S%H5892><s%> from Bethlehem <S%H1035><s%> in Judah, <S%H3063><s%> to stay <S%H1481><s%> wherever <S%H834><s%> he might find <S%H4672><s%> [a place;] and as he made <S%H6213><s%> his journey, <S%H1870><s%> he came <S%H935><s%> to the hill <S%H2022><s%> country <S%H2022><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Micah. <S%H4318><s%>

And Micah <S%H4318><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Where <S%H370><s%> do you come <S%H935><s%> from?" And he said <S%H559><s%> to him, "I am a Levite <S%H3881><s%> from Bethlehem <S%H1035><s%> in Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and I am going <S%H1980><s%> to stay <S%H1481><s%> wherever <S%H834><s%> I may find <S%H4672><s%> [a place.]"

Micah <S%H4318><s%> then said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Dwell <S%H3427><s%> with me and be a father and a priest <S%H1><s%> to me, and I will give <S%H3548><s%> you ten <S%H5414><s%> [pieces] of silver <S%H6235><s%> a year, <S%H3701><s%> a suit <S%H3117><s%> of clothes, <S%H6187><s%> and your maintenance. <S%H899><s%>" So the Levite <S%H4241><s%> went <S%H3881><s%> [in.]

And the Levite <S%H3881><s%> agreed <S%H2974><s%> to live <S%H3427><s%> with the man; <S%H376><s%> and the young <S%H5288><s%> man <S%H5288><s%> became <S%H1961><s%> to him like one <S%H259><s%> of his sons. <S%H1121><s%>

So Micah <S%H4318><s%> consecrated <S%H4390><s%> <S%H3027><s%> the Levite, <S%H3881><s%> and the young <S%H5288><s%> man <S%H5288><s%> became <S%H1961><s%> his priest <S%H3548><s%> and lived <S%H1961><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Micah. <S%H4318><s%>

Then Micah <S%H4318><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Now <S%H6258><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will prosper <S%H3190><s%> me, seeing <S%H3588><s%> I have <S%H1961><s%> a Levite <S%H3881><s%> as priest. <S%H3548><s%>"
